headline: Zebra’s CPO Shift and Elo Integration Focus Might Change The Case For Investing In ZBRA
summary: Zebra Technologies has announced that Melissa Luff Loizides will become Chief People Officer on January 1, 2026, as outgoing CPO Jeff Schmitz transitions to lead the Elo acquisition integration through mid-2026 before retiring. This planned leadership handover underscores Zebra’s emphasis on workforce planning and smooth integration of Elo, while recent quarterly results highlighted operational efficiency and resilient demand.
